mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( user_id, user_pw, user_name ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName} )
mapper.select: SELECT mem.user_no, mem.user_id, user_pw, user_name, enabled, reg_date, upd_date, auth FROM member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN member_auth auth ON mem.user_no = auth.user_no WHERE mem.user_id = #{userId}
